constitutionalTests.summary: All 12 constitutional articles upheld. No violations detected.

ARTICLE_1_DETERMINISM.evidence: Scoring algorithms use deterministic calculation only. No ML/AI/heuristics detected.

ARTICLE_2_MONOTONICITY.evidence: W-ISS-D score 97% >= previous baseline. No unexplained regression.

ARTICLE_3_HOSTILE_RESISTANCE.evidence: HITH executed with 15/15 hostile intents blocked. Leak rate: 0%.

ARTICLE_4_EVOLUTION_ENFORCEMENT.evidence: All fate transitions follow allowed paths. No evolution violations.

ARTICLE_6_HARD_GATE_BLOCKING.evidence: All HARD gates passed. No failures to verify blocking behavior.

ARTICLE_7_FORBIDDEN_PERMANENCE.evidence: No FORBIDDEN intents present. No rehabilitation attempts detected.

ARTICLE_8_CRITICAL_MANDATORY.evidence: Critical intent I-001 included in governance. criticalMandatory flag respected.

ARTICLE_9_NO_BYPASS.evidence: No bypass patterns detected: SKIP_*, DISABLE_*, BYPASS_*, FORCE_SHIP, NO_VERIFY

ARTICLE_10_TRUST_THRESHOLD.evidence: No external anchors below 30% trust. Lowest trust: 78%.

ARTICLE_11_GOVERNANCE_INTEGRITY.evidence: AGH executed with 28/28 exploits blocked. No governance vulnerabilities.

ARTICLE_12_EXTERNAL_VERIFIABILITY.evidence: Decision certificate generated with constitution hash and signature.
